variable.name: breakpoint_mobile
variable.description: The maximum width of a device (in pixels) that is served the mobile layout. Devices with a width smaller than specified will see the mobile layout. Devices with a higher width will see the tablet or desktop layout.

variable.name: breakpoint_tablet
variable.description: The maximum width of a device (in pixels) that is served the tablet layout. Devices with a screen width between the Mobile phone maximum width and the Tablet maximum width will see the tablet layout. Devices with a higher width will see the desktop layout.

variable.name: us_font
variable.description: The font used in the layout. Changing this setting will affect the entire layout but will not change your topic content.

variable.name: us_default_pane
variable.description: The default sidebar/menu opened in the output. Make sure this pane is one of the panes you enabled. If all panes are disabled, this setting will be ignored. Choose a pane: 'toc': Table of Contents; 'idx': Index'; 'glo': 'fts': Search; 'filter': Dynamic Content Filter.

variable.name: us_useTOC
variable.description: Do you want to show the TOC in the output?

variable.name: us_useIDX
variable.description: Do you want to show the index in the output?

variable.name: us_useGLO
variable.description: Do you want to show the Glossary in the output?

variable.name: us_useFilter
variable.description: Do you want to show the filter option in the output? Setting this to false will only hide the filter for the reader. You can still use the filter through a context sensitive help call. (If you enable dynamic filters in your output settings.)

variable.name: us_loading_image
variable.description: The image shown when loading a topic or other resource. Use an animated GIF for best effect.

variable.name: to_top
variable.description: The go to top image to show on desktop. Use a square image for best results.

variable.name: mobile_header_visible
variable.description: Determines whether the header will be visible on phones. It is turned off by default to optimize screen space for content.

variable.name: head_titlecolor
variable.description: The color of the title shown in the header

variable.name: head_logo
variable.description: The logo to use. Use a square logo for best results.

variable.name: head_bgcolor
variable.description: The background color of the header. This will affect all devices.

variable.name: fbd_search_text
variable.description: The color of the text in the search box.

variable.name: fbd_search_section_bgcolor
variable.description: The background color of the search section.

variable.name: fbd_search_bgcolor
variable.description: The background color of the search box.

variable.name: fbd_search_image
variable.description: The search button image. Use a square image for best results.

variable.name: fbd_search_image_active
variable.description: The search button image when the search button is being clicked. Use a square image for best results.

variable.name: fbd_bgcolor
variable.description: The background color of the function bar.

variable.name: fbd_border_color
variable.description: The (bottom) border color of the function bar.

variable.name: fbd_prev_image
variable.description: The previous button image. Use a square image for best results.

variable.name: fbd_prev_image_active
variable.description: The previous button image when the button is being clicked. Use a square image for best results.

variable.name: fbd_next_image
variable.description: The next button image. Use a square image for best results.

variable.name: fbd_next_image_active
variable.description: The next button image when the button is being clicked. Use a square image for best results.

variable.name: fbd_print
variable.description: The print button image. Use a square image for best results.

variable.name: fbt_next_image
variable.description: The next button image. Use a square image for best results.

variable.name: fbt_next_image_active
variable.description: The next button image when the button is being clicked. Use a square image for best results.

variable.name: fbt_prev_image
variable.description: The previous button image. Use a square image for best results.

variable.name: fbt_prev_image_active
variable.description: The previous button image when the button is being clicked. Use a square image for best results.

variable.name: fbm_bgcolor
variable.description: The background color of the function bar.

variable.name: fbm_border_color
variable.description: The (bottom and right) border color of the function bar.

variable.name: fbm_menu
variable.description: The menu button image. Use an image of 31x32 pixels for best results.

variable.name: fbm_search
variable.description: The search button image. Use a square image for best results.

variable.name: fbm_next_image
variable.description: The next button image. Use a square image for best results.

variable.name: fbm_next_image_active
variable.description: The next button image when the button is being clicked. Use a square image for best results.

variable.name: fbm_prev_image
variable.description: The previous button image. Use a square image for best results.

variable.name: fbm_prev_image_active
variable.description: The previous button image when the button is being clicked. Use a square image for best results.

variable.name: fbm_filter
variable.description: The filter button image when no filter is applied. Use a square image for best results.

variable.name: fbm_filter_applied
variable.description: The filter button image when a filter is applied. Use a square image for best results.

variable.name: us_desktopsidebar_state
variable.description: Choose whether the desktop sidebar must be opened (true) or closed (false) by default.

variable.name: sid_header_bgcolor
variable.description: The background color of the header.

variable.name: sid_header_border_color
variable.description: The border color of the header.

variable.name: sid_header_active_bgcolor
variable.description: The background color of the active pane tab.

variable.name: sid_header_active_border
variable.description: The border color of the active pane tab.

variable.name: sid_header_toc
variable.description: The TOC tab image. Use an image of 31x23 pixels for best results.

variable.name: sid_header_idx
variable.description: The index tab image. Use an image of 31x23 pixels for best results.

variable.name: sid_header_glo
variable.description: The glossary tab image. Use an image of 31x23 pixels for best results.

variable.name: sid_header_filter
variable.description: The filter tab image when no filter is applied. Use an image of 31x23 pixels for best results.

variable.name: sid_header_filter_applied
variable.description: The filter tab image when no filter is applied. Use an image of 31x23 pixels for best results.

variable.name: sid_header_search
variable.description: The search tab image. (Only visible to readers when you choose to show search results in the sidebar.) Use an image of 31x23 pixels for best results.

variable.name: sid_slider_ltr
variable.description: The close sidebar image for left to right languages. Use an image of 16x25 pixels for best results.

variable.name: sid_slider_open_ltr
variable.description: The open sidebar image for left to right languages. Use an image of 16x25 pixels for best results.

variable.name: sid_slider_rtl
variable.description: The close sidebar image for right to left languages. Use an image of 16x25 pixels for best results.

variable.name: sid_slider_open_rtl
variable.description: The open sidebar image for right to left languages. Use an image of 16x25 pixels for best results.

variable.name: sit_header_active_bgcolor
variable.description: The background color of the active pane tab.

variable.name: sit_header_active_border
variable.description: The border color of the active pane tab.

variable.name: sit_header_bgcolor
variable.description: The background color of the header.

variable.name: sit_header_border_color
variable.description: The border color of the header.

variable.name: sit_sidebar_border_color
variable.description: The border color of the sidebar.

variable.name: sit_header_toc
variable.description: The TOC tab image. Use an image with maximum size of 50x50 pixels for best results. Smaller sizes will always fit.

variable.name: sit_header_idx
variable.description: The index tab image. Use an image with maximum size of 50x50 pixels for best results. Smaller sizes will always fit.

variable.name: sit_header_glo
variable.description: The glossary tab image. Use an image with maximum size of 50x50 pixels for best results. Smaller sizes will always fit.

variable.name: sit_header_filter
variable.description: The filter tab image when no filter is applied. Use an image with maximum size of 50x50 pixels for best results. Smaller sizes will always fit.

variable.name: sit_header_filter_applied
variable.description: The filter tab image when no filter is applied. Use an image with maximum size of 50x50 pixels for best results. Smaller sizes will always fit.

variable.name: sit_header_search
variable.description: The search tab image. (Only visible to readers when you choose to show search results in the sidebar.) Use an image with maximum size of 50x50 pixels for best results. Smaller sizes will always fit.

variable.name: sim_header_bgcolor
variable.description: The background color of the header.

variable.name: sim_header_border_color
variable.description: The border color of the header.

variable.name: sim_header_active_bgcolor
variable.description: The background color of the active pane tab.

variable.name: sim_header_toc
variable.description: The TOC tab image. Use an image of 31x23 pixels for best results.

variable.name: sim_header_idx
variable.description: The index tab image. Use an image of 31x23 pixels for best results.

variable.name: sim_header_glo
variable.description: The glossary tab image. Use an image of 31x23 pixels for best results.

variable.name: us_searchresults_location
variable.description: Choose whether the the search results on desktop are shown in the sidebar (true) or in the content section (false). This setting affects Desktop only.

variable.name: fts_highlight_color
variable.description: The highlight color for search results in the current topic.

variable.name: fts_highlight_text_color
variable.description: The text color for highlighted search results in the current topic.

variable.name: fts_input_bgcolor
variable.description: The background color of the search field.

variable.name: fts_input_border-color
variable.description: The border color of the search field.

variable.name: us_andsearch
variable.description: Choose the reader has a setting to choose to search all search terms (true) or whether this option is hidden for the reader (false).

variable.name: fts_and_enabled
variable.description: The image when the AND search option is enabled.

variable.name: fts_and_disabled
variable.description: The image when the AND search option is disabled.

variable.name: fts_filter_msg_color
variable.description: The color of the changed filter message.

variable.name: fts_msg_color
variable.description: The color of the search message.

variable.name: fts_title_color
variable.description: The title color of the found topic in the search results.

variable.name: fts_preview_color
variable.description: The preview color of the found topic in the search results.

variable.name: fts_bread_color
variable.description: The breadcrumb color of the found topic in the search results.

variable.name: fts_back_image_ltr
variable.description: The back image to exit search mode on mobile devices for left to right languages. Use a square image for best results.

variable.name: fts_back_image_rtl
variable.description: The back image to exit search mode on mobile devices for right to left languages. Use a square image for best results.

variable.name: toc_entry_color
variable.description: The text color of topic entries.

variable.name: toc_entry_selected_color
variable.description: The text color of the selected topic entry.

variable.name: toc_entry_selected_border_color
variable.description: The color of the indicator left of the selected topic entry.

variable.name: toc_desktop_closed_book_image
variable.description: The closed book image on desktops. Use an image of 15x15 pixels for best results.

variable.name: toc_desktop_open_book_image
variable.description: The opened book image on desktops. Use an image of 15x15 pixels for best results.

variable.name: toc_desktop_page_image
variable.description: The topic image on desktops. Use an image of 15x15 pixels for best results.

variable.name: toc_desktop_link_image_ltr
variable.description: The image for external links on desktops for left to right languages. Use an image of 15x15 pixels for best results.

variable.name: toc_desktop_link_image_rtl
variable.description: The image for external links on desktops for right to left languages. Use an image of 15x15 pixels for best results.

variable.name: us_toc_drilldown
variable.description: Choose whether the TOC for mobile and tablet shows only the current TOC level (true) or shows all levels like on desktop (false).

variable.name: toc_mobile_book_image_drilldown
variable.description: The up one level image for the TOC when you selected the drill down mode in the Settings section. Only available on tablets and mobile devices. Use a square image for best results.

variable.name: toc_mobile_open_book_image
variable.description: The opened book image on tablets and mobile devices. Use a square image for best results.

variable.name: toc_mobile_closed_book_image
variable.description: The closed book image on tablets and mobile devices. Use a square image for best results.

variable.name: toc_mobile_page_image
variable.description: The topic image on tablets and mobile devices. Use a square image for best results.

variable.name: toc_mobile_link_image_ltr
variable.description: The image for external links on tablets and mobile devices for left to right languages. Use a square image for best results.

variable.name: toc_mobile_link_image_rtl
variable.description: The image for external links on tablets and mobile devices for right to left languages. Use a square image for best results.

variable.name: idx_search_text
variable.description: The color of the text in the search box.

variable.name: idx_input_border_color
variable.description: The border color of the search field.

variable.name: idx_alphabet_color
variable.description: The text color of the alphabet letter between index entries.

variable.name: idx_alphabeth_separator_color
variable.description: The text color of the alphabet separator (line below) between index entries.

variable.name: idx_entry_color
variable.description: The text color of index entries.

variable.name: idx_page_image
variable.description: The topic (link) image in the Index. Use an image of 15x15 pixels for best results.

variable.name: glo_search_text
variable.description: The color of the text in the search box.

variable.name: glo_input_border-color
variable.description: The border color of the search field.

variable.name: glo_alphabet_color
variable.description: The text color of the alphabet letter between glossary entries.

variable.name: glo_alphabet_separator_color
variable.description: The text color of the alphabet separator (line below) between glossary entries.

variable.name: glo_entry_color
variable.description: The text color of glossary entries.

variable.name: glo_def_color
variable.description: The text color of glossary definitions.

variable.name: filter_title_color
variable.description: The text color of the filter title.

variable.name: filter_title_border_color
variable.description: The separator (line below) of the filter title.

variable.name: filter_reset_image
variable.description: The image for the clear filter button. Use a square image for best results.

variable.name: filter_group_bgcolor
variable.description: The background color of a filter group header.

variable.name: filter_item_color
variable.description: The text color of filter entries.

variable.name: filter_selected_image_checkbox
variable.description: The image shown before an active filter when you use the checkbox filter type. Use a square image for best results.

variable.name: filter_unselected_image_checkbox
variable.description: The image shown before an inactive filter when you use the checkbox filter type. Use a square image for best results.

variable.name: filter_selected_image_radio
variable.description: The image shown before an active filter when you use the radio button filter type. Use a square image for best results.

variable.name: filter_unselected_image_radio
variable.description: The image shown before an inactive filter when you use the radio button filter type. Use a square image for best results.

variable.name: filter_mobile_header_border_color
variable.description: The separator color (line below) of the filter header. This header is visible on mobile devices only.

variable.name: filter_mobile_back_image
variable.description: The back image to exit filter mode on mobile devices. Use a square image for best results.

variable.name: social_close_ltr
variable.description: The image to close the social media dialog for left to right languages. Use a square image for best results.

variable.name: social_close_rtl
variable.description: The image to close the social media dialog for right to left languages. Use a square image for best results.

variable.name: us_useFacebook
variable.description: Do you want to show the Facebook like button in the output? Setting this to false will hide the Facebook like button. (Works for hosted output only.)

variable.name: us_useTwitter
variable.description: Do you want to show the Tweet button in the output? Setting this to false will hide the Tweet button. (Works for hosted output only.)

variable.name: social_border_color
variable.description: The border color of the social media overlay.

variable.name: social_open
variable.description: The image to open the social media dialog. Use a square image for best results.
